data.title: Picard
data.description: A set of command line tools (in Java) for manipulating high-throughput sequencing (HTS) data and formats such as SAM/BAM/CRAM and VCF.
data.name: picard

evidence: README indicates network usage: "Picard is migrating to [semantic versioning](https://semver.org/). We will eventually adhere to it strictly and bump our major version whenever there are breaking changes to our API, but until we more"
"A set of Java command line tools for manipulating high-throughput sequencing (HTS) data and formats."

Build instructions emphasize cloning and building from the repo: "First, clone the repo: git clone https://github.com/broadinstitute/picard.git" and then "To build a fully-packaged, runnable Picard jar..."
